content.text: Hustle is a member of Krieg Pirates. He is a combat instructor and is only mentioned in the One Piece Blue Data book. He only appeared in the manga.
Hustle is an average sized man, with moderately large muscles, and black hair styled in a curled pompadour. He sports a plain white shirt.
Hustle seems quite self centered, as he is always flexing his muscles and staring at them.
Not much is known about his abilities and powers, although his rank being a "Combat Instructor" suggest he has some skill in combat.
He stayed in the water during Luffy's fight with Krieg so he could avoid Krieg's poisonous attacks.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 7 Chapter 60, Hustle makes his debut.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File, Hustle's name and position is revealed.
↑  Vivre Card - One Piece Visual Dictionary, Hustle's birthday is given.
